snippet: Younger members representing the Islamist core of the National Congress Party are pushing an agenda of fighting corruption and expanding dialogue with the opposition.
abstract: Young members of Sudanese Islamic Movement, organization that represents Islamist core of governing National Congress Party, are pushing agenda of fighting corruption in government and expanding dialogue with the opposition.
lead_paragraph: Younger members representing the Islamist core of the National Congress Party are pushing an agenda of fighting corruption and expanding dialogue with the opposition.

headline.seo: Rumblings for Change Within Sudan’s Governing Party
headline.main: Rumblings for Change in Sudan’s Governing Party
headline.print_headline: Rumblings for Change in Sudan’s Governing Party
